DOC.brief_summary: This is a long-term safety study for Phase 2 subjects who choose to remain on Exubera® (inhaled insulin).
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Safety Study of Inhaled Insulin: An Up to Four-Year Extension of Therapy in Subjects With Type 1 or Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: The study was terminated on Oct. 18, 2007. This study is not a post approval commitment study. Pfizer decided to cancel new trials because of the decision to withdraw Exubera® (inhaled insulin) due to lack of market performance and not for safety reasons.
DOC.criteria: Subjects with Type 1 or Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus who participated in previous Phase 2 extension protocols Smoking Pregnancy
